name: gushily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that expresses strong positive feeling that often seems too emotional or does not sound sincere: She spent most of our lunch together gushily telling me about her new job. The online review gushily praised the restaurant for even the most basic services, which made us think it was written by a friend of the owner. Related word
gushy
More examplesFewer examplesWhen we met the actor we couldn't help but gushily praise his work in his latest film. I don't know if he could have talked more gushily about his favourite band.
